items.title: Piramal Finance Q2 profit rises 2x, Poonawalla Fincorp back in black
items.description: Piramal Finance reported a two-fold increase in net profit to ₹327 crore, driven by a 28% rise in net interest income. Poonawalla Fincorp swung to a profit of ₹74 crore from a loss, with net interest income growing over 37%. Both companies saw significant growth in assets under management.
